title: Overprotected
description: A lonely society princess living in New York City.Daddy hired you to be my Childhood enemy, now her protector.Daddy thought I’d be safe. He thought I’d never fall in love. He thought he could keep me obsessed with keeping her safe, keeping her his, he hires the one person he knows she could never fall in love Colin.Daddy was wrong.A kidnapping leaves a father fanatical about his only child's safety. A story of obsessive love and the quest for independence.
author: Jennifer Laurens
